title.rendered: Acclime appoints Eddy Herbert as Partner & Commercial Director

content.rendered:
Acclime, a leading corporate services provider in Asia, is delighted to announce the appointment of Eddy Herbert as Partner & Commercial Director. This strategic move follows the recent acquisition of FocusCore Corporate Services Singapore, which Eddy founded and has successfully grown.

Eddy brings a wealth of experience spanning two decades in Asia, specialising in corporate services, payroll, PEO, and HR outsourcing services. His expertise and deep understanding of the market make him an invaluable asset to Acclime as it continues to expand its footprint across the region.

While assuming his new role at Acclime, Eddy will continue to manage FocusCore Myanmar, an independent team providing exceptional corporate services. FocusCore Myanmar serves renowned international organisations such as The British Council, The British Chamber of Commerce in Myanmar, Prudential, Bank of China, IATA, and numerous other esteemed companies and associations.

Acclime’s CEO, Martin Crawford, expressed his excitement about Eddy joining the team, stating, “We are thrilled to have Eddy onboard as Partner & Commercial Director. His extensive industry experience and successful track record in the corporate services sector will be instrumental in driving Acclime’s growth and delivering outstanding client solutions.”

Eddy’s appointment signifies Acclime’s commitment to bolstering its leadership team with accomplished professionals who deeply understand the markets they serve. His unique insights and exceptional leadership skills will contribute to Acclime’s mission of empowering businesses to thrive in Asia by providing comprehensive corporate services tailored to their needs.

Eddy will focus on business development for Acclime in a number of ASEAN countries, reporting directly to Blair Lucas, the Group Commercial Director.
